channel.title: Downloaded source/client wont connect.. please help
channel.description:
Hey i am trying to start up my own Server again as i use to have one few years back, i cannot remeber for the life of me where to change the connection so only i can log into it and what to put there?
help much appreciated, thanks. Jake.

item.title: Downloaded source/client wont connect.. please help
item.dc:creator: @Mahtava Mahtava
item.description:
@Mahtava wrote:

Run your server, then run your client after and try log in. If this does not work then go into your clients folder and look for the client.java. Open that up and press Ctrl+F and search for the word ‘Ip’ then keep looking until you can see an ip number, change this to ‘127.0.0.1’

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Downloaded source/client wont connect.. please help
